text: Sir John Watson may refer to: * Sir John Watson Gordon (1788–1864), Scottish painter * Sir John Watson (polo), English polo player and winner of the International Polo Cup in 1876 * Sir John Watson (Indian Army officer) (1829–1919), English recipient of the Victoria Cross in 1857 * Sir John Watson (solicitor general) (1883–1944), Scottish advocate and sheriff, Solicitor General for Scotland 1929–31 * Sir Stephen John Watson FRSE (1898-1976) British agriculturalist
title: Sir John Watson
